input: Write a short biography of Julius Caesar.

He then established a dictatorial regime, passing on power to his grandnephew, Augustus, after his death in 44 BC. His military conquests and reforms contributed to Rome's dominance in the ancient world, and he is widely considered one of the greatest generals in history.
